summary: Publish a public case study that proves TEOF value with receipts

steps.title: Select and prep pilot partner
steps.notes: Align on scope, consent, and guardrails for an external engagement (Relay sprint or authenticity audit).

steps.title: Run the engagement end-to-end
steps.notes: Capture conductor prompts, diff/test receipts, and outcomes under `_report/usage/case-study/`.

steps.title: Publish case study + ledger entry
steps.notes: Write a public-facing summary (blog/video) linking to receipts and log the win in `docs/vision/impact-ledger.md`.

checkpoint.description: External partner confirms value; public case study links to verifiable receipts
